name: rebuy/amqp-php-consumer
description: Library for creating annotation based AMQP consumers

suggest.psr/log: required if you'd like to use the LogHandler or LogSubscriber
suggest.league/statsd: required if you'd like to use the TimingSubscriber
suggest.symfony/stopwatch: required if you'd like to use the TimingSubscriber in the amqp package
suggest.jms/serializer: required if you'd like to use the jms serializer
suggest.symfony/serializer: required if you'd like to use the symfony serializer
